description: Modern Tortilla is the product of a dream come true, courtesy of 3 lifelong friends who share a passion for making the tastiest Southwestern food. You’re invited to come out and choose from all sorts of yummy options in order create the perfect taco. Gluten-free corn tortillas come in Cilantro Lime, Smokey Chipotle, or the OG (original corn). For mouthwatering meats, you’ve got slow-roasted pork pastor, braised chicken cochinita pibil, grass-fed beef skirt steak, or lime-scented cod. Mango salsa, crema, grilled pineapple, and roasted sweet corn are just a few of the amazing toppings you’ll find in their vast selection. For all this and much more, make your way to Modern Tortilla!
name: Modern Tortilla
